Project: abvx-shortener
Stack: node

Agent context bundle (LLMO Pack):
- Run guide: docs/ai/how-to-run.md
- Test guide: docs/ai/how-to-test.md
- Architecture: docs/ai/architecture.md
- Data contracts: docs/ai/data-contracts.md
- Security: SECURITY_AI.md
- Contributing: CONTRIBUTING_AI.md

Quick commands:
- install: npm --prefix worker install
- dev: npm --prefix worker run dev
- test: not available
- lint: npm --prefix worker run lint
- build: npm --prefix worker run deploy

Notes:
- Keep these files concise and command-accurate. Avoid speculative guidance.
